name: payroll_action_015
body: token :: transfer (CpiContext :: new_with_signer (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . payroll_src_015 . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . payroll_dst_015 . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . auth . to_account_info () } , & [& [b"payroll" , & [ctx . bumps ["auth"]]]]) , amount ,) ? ;

fields.name: payroll_src_015

fields.name: auth
